title: Beyond Balance Inc.® | Herbal Solutions for Complex Patients
description: Beyond Balance® herbal supplements have been used for over 25 years internationally by holistic and Lyme-literate healthcare practitioners.
cleaned_text: Providing Herbal Solutions for Complex Patients Learn how Beyond Balance® formulas can assist your patients on the road to better health. [Browse Formulas](https://beyondbalanceinc.com/products) Effective, High-Quality Formulas For over 25 years, Beyond Balance® formulas have been used internationally by prominent holistic and Lyme-literate physicians and other healthcare practitioners to help provide microbial support, promote detoxification, and enhance the body's ability to heal. Manufactured with Integrity We select all of our manufacturers with the utmost care. We carefully verify their production practices and ensure that they are of high integrity. All products are produced in GMP-compliant facilities where the highest standards are followed. Ingredients are regularly tested for quality and purity. Cutting-Edge Extracts Beyond Balance® formulas have proven effective in helping thousands of patients battle immune, neuro-immune, and environmental illnesses. Drop Shipment Arrangement We can ship product orders directly to your patients. We would like to partner with you. Together, we can assist your patients on their road to achieving better health. [Open a Professional Account](https://beyondbalanceinc.com/register/) [Not a licensed practitioner?](find-a-practitioner) How to Purchase Healthcare professionals can purchase directly from Beyond Balance® after opening a professional account. Technical Support We offer personal and professional assistance for practitioners through our technical support representatives.
